data.actual_result: A persistent notification is displayed by Android System, telling you the app is running (this should theoretically persist even when the above bug is fixed), please see the following XDA Devs post: <https://www.xda-developers.com/hide-app-running-background-notification-android-oreo/>
data.expected_result: Discord call controls should appear (this is related to the following: <https://trello.com/c/1JZH4yg5/>)
data.short_description: [Android Oreo] While in a voice call, putting Discord in the background creates a persistent unneeded notification
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice call or channel - Put the application in the background (e.g. going to the home screen, switching apps, etc.) - Open the notification bar
